Summary: made a bunch or wind and a spotlight. 40 feet above ground
divs: Sighting Detailsi was riding in my moms car to school no wind was about and no storm.there was a car in front of us and a huge spot light shined on it. i looked up and i see, about 40 to 50 feet in the air,what looked like a decommissioned black bird airplane hovering. it slowly moved to the power lines and they started shaking. then a blinding light and the plane was gone.no one was able to see it i believe, i was shocked no one believed me for a while.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Brice
This sighting has never been favorited.
